AFRO: WHO Regional Office for Africa (see below for Member States covered)
AMRO/PAHO: WHO Regional Office for the Americas/Pan American Health Organization (see below for Member States covered)
CDS/CPE: Communicable Diseases Cluster/Department of Communicable Diseases Control, Prevention and Eradication
CGPM: Conference General des Poids et Mésures
CNPM: Conselho Nacional de Publicidade de Medicamentos
DECO: Associação Portuguesa para a Defesa do Consumidor
EDM: Department of Essential Drugs and Medicines Policy (within Health Technology and Pharmaceuticals Cluster)
EHIBCC: European Healthcare Industry Business Communications Council
EMEA: Agência Europeia de Avaliação de Medicamentos
EMRO: WHO Regional Office for the Eastern Mediterranean (see below for Member States covered)
EURO: WHO Regional Office for Europe (see below for Member States covered)
FCH/CAH: Family and Community Health Cluster/Department of Child and Adolescent Health and Development
FCH/RHR: Family and Community Health Cluster/Department of Reproductive Health and Research
HIV/AIDS: Human Immunodeficiency Virus / Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
IFPMA: International Federation of Pharmaceutical Manufacturers Associations
MNSRM: Medicamento Não Sujeito a Receita Médica
NMH/NCP: Noncommunicable Diseases and Mental Health Cluster /Department of Noncommunicable Disease Prevention
SDE/EHA: Sustainable Development and Healthy Environments Cluster /Department of Emergency and Humanitarian Action
SEARO: WHO Regional Office for South-East Asia (see below for countries covered)
TRIPS: (Agreement on) Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights
UNCTAD: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
UKCPRS: UK Standard Clinical Products Reference Source
WPRO: WHO Regional Office for the Western Pacific (see below for Member States covered)
